summary: An email from an FBI Special Agent in New York apologizing for a delayed response due to being 'pulled out of town on the Epstein case' and offering to schedule a call regarding a 'Nygard' matter. The document highlights ongoing FBI activity related to the Epstein investigation in July 2020.

persons.name: Nygard
persons.context: The email is a response regarding scheduling a call about 'Nygard', indicating he is a subject of interest or discussion for the FBI.

events.title: FBI Agent Email on Epstein Case Activity
events.description: An FBI Special Agent sends an email apologizing for a delayed response because they were 'pulled out of town on the Epstein case' and offers to schedule a call about 'Nygard'.

keyFacts: An FBI Special Agent was actively working on the Epstein case and was 'pulled out of town' for it as of July 2020.
The email is a response regarding scheduling a call about an individual named 'Nygard'.
The document shows ongoing FBI investigative activity related to the Epstein case well after Jeffrey Epstein's death in 2019.
